title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Fort Hunt Concerts
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Fort Hunt Concerts              Fort Hunt Concerts       Fort Hunt concerts are usually held at Pavilion A on Sundays evenings in June, July, and August. The park's grassy fields are a great place to relax with a picnic while local bands play music from a variety of genres.      Date    Musical Group      5-Jun    Mandoleers      12-Jun    National Concert Band      19-Jun    Main Street Community Band      26-Jun    Potomac Harmony Chorus      3-Jul    Fort Washington Community Chorus      10-Jul    Vox Pop      17-Jul    Northern Virginia Sax Ensemble      24-Jul    Black Moon Tonic      31-Jul    Vienna Community Band      7-Aug    Nitehawks Swing      14-Aug    Mount Vernon Concert Band      21-Aug    Alte Kameraden      28-Aug     Lesson Zero
